Sandra TeoLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 12 Mar 2019Some recession-proof stocks in the SG market is Singapore Press Holdings Limited (SGX:T39) and Centurion Corp Ltd (SGX: OU8). These stocks operate in the accomodation asset, commercial space and residential housing industry which are usually recession prooft as there is a supply-demand mismatch.0 comments1
